snippet: Senator Dean G. Skelos and his son, Adam B. Skelos, are accused of using the lawmaker’s power and influence to obtain more than $300,000 in payments.
abstract: Glenwood Management senior executive Charles Dorego testifies in federal corruption trial of former New York State Sen Dean G Skelos and his son Adam and describes how Skelos secured job for Adam; notes that it is not only time Skelos sought to secure benefits for his son.

byline.original: By SUSANNE CRAIG and WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM

lead_paragraph: Senator Dean G. Skelos and his son, Adam B. Skelos, are accused of using the lawmaker’s power and influence to obtain more than $300,000 in payments.

headline.main: Skelos’s Efforts to Get a Job for His Son Are Recounted
headline.print_headline: Skelos’s Efforts to Get a Job for His Son Are Recounted
